constraints.domestic_flight_exception: No volume restriction for domestic routes.
notes: Containers ≤100 ml in a single 1 L zip bag; bag must be sealed.
Non-flammable sprays in checked baggage: ≤500 ml per item, ≤2 L total.

constraints.domestic_flight_exception: No volume restriction on domestic flights.
notes: Foods containing liquids/gel (e.g., gochujang, kimchi) follow the same 100 ml rule for carry-on.
Allowed without volume limits in checked baggage.

exceptions: Razors with safety blades or electric razors
constraints.notes: Sharp objects such as swords, daggers, large knives are prohibited in cabin baggage.

requirements: Provide firearm possession permit or import/export license to airline.
Separate ammunition and secure in container.
Scopes and firearm parts may be carried on or checked.
constraints.notes: Subject to airline approval and national firearm regulations.

notes: Spare Li-ion batteries ≤100 Wh allowed in cabin without quantity restriction.
100–160 Wh: up to 2 batteries with airline approval.
Standards may vary by airline; confirm before travel.

constraints.notes: Follow aviation hazardous materials transport standards and airline guidance.

items: Materials undermining national security, public safety, or morals (books, media, etc.)
Items leaking government secrets or aiding espionage
Firearms, swords, explosives, replicas, and toxic substances (permit required from authorities)
Narcotics, psychotropic substances, cannabis products (require approval from Ministry of Health and Welfare)
Currency or KRW-denominated instruments exceeding USD 10,000-equivalent without declaration
Cashier’s checks, personal checks, postal orders, precious metals (restricted)
Cultural properties (export permit or certificate required)
Aquatic species requiring transplantation approval under Fisheries Act
Hazardous wastes subject to transboundary movement regulations
Plants, fruits, vegetables, agricultural products (require quarantine/inspection certificates)
constraints.notes: May require permits, declarations, or are subject to confiscation if carried without authorization.

carry_on_standards: Liquids ≤100 ml per container inside a sealed 1 L transparent bag.
Duty-free liquids allowed regardless of volume when sealed in approved duty-free bags until final destination.
constraints.handling_of_abandoned_items: Prohibited items surrendered at screening are donated to social welfare organizations and publicly reported.
